Vue Interface

  • Utilities

    • prefix
    • transition
      • unit

    # transition

    Use the transition or animation delay and return a promise that gets executed after delay. If no element delay, then promise will be called immediately.

    transition(el, defaultValue)
    • el DOMElement
      The HTML element used to calculate the transition delate.

    Returns string|object

    # Example

    transition(el).then(delay => {
    console.log('delayed!', delay);
});
